page.title: 04 RINGLEMERE FARM
page.content: Ringlemere Farm is 10 years old,it is an arable farm owned by Mr.Smith.They grow small vegetables such as lettuce, spring onions,beetroot,also potatoes onions and sprouts.They also grow Galahad & Avalon wheat. They keep straw to cover up potatoes and to sell They also have a wholesale business, they buy some vegetables from other farmers and take them to shops in Whitstable,Herne Bay and Folkestone. An old railway track runs across the farm,it ran from Woodnesborough to Ash. We walked along the track to Poulton Farm and looked at the fields with Mrs.Smith. They have some special machinery on the farm eg combine harvester,potato harvester,m/c to remove sprouts from the stalks.There is a cold store for the salad vegetables.Potatoes & onions are stored in a large ventilated shed
